snippet: The Donetsk People’s Republic, along with other pro-Russian groups, denied having anything to do with fliers purporting to demand registration.
abstract: Report that leaflets circulated in Donetsk, Ukraine, demanding that Jews register and pay a fine or leave the area draws high-level international condemnation, including from Sec of State John Kerry; Donetsk People's Republic, newly declared and unrecognized state that claims to represent ethnic Russians in eastern Ukraine, denies it has anything to do with leaflets.

byline.contributor: Michael R. Gordon contributed reporting from Geneva.

lead_paragraph: The Donetsk People’s Republic, along with other pro-Russian groups, denied having anything to do with fliers purporting to demand registration.

headline.main: Demands That Jews Register in Eastern Ukraine Are Denounced, and Denied
headline.print_headline: Demands That Jews Register in Eastern Ukraine Are Denounced, and Denied
